alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 6:44PM MDT until March 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. * WHERE...The Interstate 90 Corridor between Bozeman and Whitehall, and The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin accumulating on roadway surfaces tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters
